fr.upmc.colins.farm3.connectors

Class ControlRequestServiceConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.upmc.colins.farm3.connectors.ControlRequestServiceConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlRequestArrivalI, fr.upmc.components.connectors.ConnectorI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.TwoWayI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ControlRequestServiceConnector
extends fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
implements ControlRequestArrivalI, java.io.Serializable
    The class ControlRequestServiceConnector implements the connector between the outbound port of a component sending control requests with the inbound port of another controlled component.

    Description

    Simply pass the method call to the offering inbound port.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 23 nov. 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Colins-Alasca
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
